class.name: KinematicCollision3D
class.brief_description: Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody3D].
class.description: Holds collision data from the movement of a [PhysicsBody3D], usually from [method PhysicsBody3D.move_and_collide]. When a [PhysicsBody3D] is moved, it stops if it detects a collision with another body. If a collision is detected, a [KinematicCollision3D] object is returned. The collision data includes the colliding object, the remaining motion, and the collision position. This data can be used to determine a custom response to the collision.

method.name: get_angle
method.description: Returns the collision angle according to [param up_direction], which is [constant Vector3.UP] by default. This value is always positive.

method.name: get_collider
method.description: Returns the colliding body's attached [Object] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_collider_id
method.description: Returns the unique instance ID of the colliding body's attached [Object] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default). See [method Object.get_instance_id].

method.name: get_collider_rid
method.description: Returns the colliding body's [RID] used by the [PhysicsServer3D] given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_collider_shape
method.description: Returns the colliding body's shape given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_collider_shape_index
method.description: Returns the colliding body's shape index given a collision index (the deepest collision by default). See [CollisionObject3D].

method.name: get_collider_velocity
method.description: Returns the colliding body's velocity given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_collision_count
method.description: Returns the number of detected collisions.

method.name: get_depth
method.description: Returns the colliding body's length of overlap along the collision normal.

method.name: get_local_shape
method.description: Returns the moving object's colliding shape given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_normal
method.description: Returns the colliding body's shape's normal at the point of collision given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_position
method.description: Returns the point of collision in global coordinates given a collision index (the deepest collision by default).

method.name: get_remainder
method.description: Returns the moving object's remaining movement vector.

method.name: get_travel
method.description: Returns the moving object's travel before collision.
